subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: San Antonio, known for its team play, beat Miami in Game 5 of the N.B.A. finals by providing guards Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili one-on-one opportunities.
snippet: San Antonio, known for its team play, beat Miami in Game 5 of the N.B.A. finals by providing guards Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili one-on-one opportunities.
